Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes. If the question prompts you to “Calculate,” you must show how you arrived at your final answer.

Flowerland is an open economy with a flexible exchange rate regime. The natural rate of unemployment is <math alttext="5%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, the frictional rate of unemployment is <math alttext="4%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the actual rate of unemployment is <math alttext="7%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>.

(a) What is the numerical value of the cyclical rate of unemployment in Flowerland?

(b) Assume the foreign demand for lavender oil produced in Flowerland increases. What will happen to each of the following in Flowerland in the short run?

(i) Aggregate demand. Explain.

(ii) Cyclical unemployment.

(d) If nominal income in Flowerland increased by <math alttext="20%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> from 2019 to 2020, will the standard of living of the average citizen of Flowerland increase, decrease, or stay the same from 2019 to 2020? Explain.
